alert.note: Alert for Southern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued December 15 at 6:52PM EST until December 16 at 5:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...Southern New London County. * WHEN...Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Brief minor flooding of the more vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. THAMES RIVER AT NEW LONDON CT MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 5.0 FT, MODERATE 6.0 FT, MAJOR 7.8 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 2.0 FT, MODERATE 3.0 FT, MAJOR 4.8 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 16/03 AM 3.7/ 4.2 0.8/ 1.3 1.5/ 2.0 2-3 NONE 16/03 PM 4.9/ 5.4 1.9/ 2.3 2.7/ 3.2 2-3 MINOR 17/05 AM 3.2/ 3.7 0.2/ 0.8 1.0/ 1.5 1-2 NONE 17/04 PM 2.3/ 2.8 -0.7/-0.2 0.2/ 0.8 2-3 NONE 18/05 AM 3.0/ 3.5 0.0/ 0.5 0.4/ 0.9 1-2 NONE &&
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
